name: Battle of the Space Fellas
description:
Submission for Mix and Game Jam 2020

Face off against Craig, the greatest evil in the universe, in a turn based platformer battle to the death!

What is a turn based platformer?

during each turn, a platformer is played to decide the outcome of an attack. For example, on the the player's turn, if the platforming segment is complete, the attack hits. If the platforming segment is completed fast enough, The hit will be a critical hit!

WASD-move
